import { useFormik } from 'formik' import React from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Form, FormGroup, Input } from 'reactstrap' import validationSchema from "./validations" import BloodGroups from '../BloodGroups' import Cities from '../Cities' const RegisterForm = () => { const { handleSubmit, handleChange, handleBlur, values, errors, touched, isSubmitting } = useFormik({ initialValues: { firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", cityId: "", genderId: "", bloodGroupId: "", userName: "", password: "", passwordConfirm: "", }, onSubmit: (values, bag) => { console.log(values) bag.resetForm() }, validationSchema }) return (
{errors.firstName && touched.firstName &&
{errors.firstName}
} {errors.lastName && touched.lastName &&
{errors.lastName}
} {errors.email && touched.email &&
{errors.email}
} {errors.password && touched.password &&
{errors.password}
}
Kayıt Ol Şiftemi Unuttum
) } export default RegisterForm
